short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Drag anything on the website to open link in new tab, search for selected text or perform many other actions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Upper left: open to the left in the background
- Upper right: open to the right in the background
- Lower Left: open to the left in the foreground
- Lower right: open to the right in the foreground
